reviews.review: Just DC'd from a match, can't join back, banned from matchmaking for 5 minutes. This game is beyond unplayable and game is designed toward face camping and various shitty experiences. I wish I could get my money back at this point. Each update results in worse and worse game play.
A great experience that will keep you on the egde of your seat

Overall a great game to pass the time casually or competitively.  Once you rank up, or nowadays.. when your skill-based matchmaking goes up, you will be paired with better players and it becomes a bit more challenging.  With the introduction of new perks, the game balance will tilt slightly towards survivors or killers but they try to keep it fairly consistent.  There are a few issues/bugs but it's a jolly good time!


Fun game!  Better with friends.. But I don't have any.
This game brings me great agony, I love it.
恐怖片爱好者 长大后就成了你

I like having a game where I can play solo as the killer and have a great time and I can also play with friends in survivor mode! I mostly play with friends but i enjoy being the killer once in a while to earn more points and sink into my survivors.

El juego tiene muchos bugs de los cuales los desarrolladores pondran todo su esfuerzo y dedicacion a sacar mas skin que vendernos.
Si tienes amigos te divertiras un poco ya que su comunidad es bastante toxica.

纯几把脑瘫盯着屠夫砍，主玩枪手直接砍到下水道。本来1段屠夫就劣势，还搁这砍屠夫是要把把4跑？狗屎隐藏分系统，几个月没玩20段屠夫上来匹4个1段人类玩你妈呢？
1000+hrs 
but new patch=SH1T balance+SH1T ranking system
why nerf the killers while rank 1 is already hard for killer`s side？
uninstall the game for the SH1T nerfs
Bought this game just to face camp players then refunded. Would recommend for the salt 10/10
it has a lot of bugs and for some reason it doesnt want to update idk but its good
dont do it if you value your happiness

I will recommend the game because overall it's fun to play.. The community on the other hand, especially low-mid rank is full of toxic players and players not knowing the basic game mechanics.. That being said: If you just practice your stuff, do what the random survivors don't, then you'll be fine... Play with friends, have fun.
Divertido tanto para quem joga de forma casual quanto para quem se dedica mais. É divertido jogar com amigos e também sozinho. O lore é bem interessante para quem curte se aprofundar em lore.

Absolutely soul crushing and will drain your wallet, I have hit my head on my desk so many times because of this game and have lost faith in humanity in over 12 different possible ways. 10/10 would buy again.

...DBD is a mess gameplay and developer wise. The streaming community and playing with friends is one of the few things that keep me playing. 

Almost 1k hours later....

Man, Dead by Daylight just makes me sad.
It was my favorite game for a while, introduced me to a Ton of Friends, but also content creators, with devs that did mistakes, but seemed to Genuinely care. It's easy to make fun of it, but I think they DID do a 'Pretty good job so far

I quit the game with the release of the Oni, which means I missed 7 Killers and 8 Survivor releases and a ton of "Patches" that only broke the game more, than they Patched, so why am I writing this now?
With the release of Jill from Resident Evil 3, I figured "eh, why not try, you used to enjoy the game quite a bit" and well, it's still as terrible as it used to be.

well, moving on from Nostalgia now, let's talk where DbD went wrong
Not only were releases for both, Killers and Survivors incredibly broken and unfun to play against, but the Community also got so much worse.
Patches and hot Fixes only broke the game more. 
the introduction of a Set rank, instead of a Rank that increases and decreases depending on who Carries you.
and the Devs not only Lying but first denying, THEN admitting to it, just to deny it again that they're lying is just sad.
NFT's are incredibly harmful to the environment, which is already dying a slow, painful death, and need I remind you? 
if the environment dies, WE DIE.

Either way, the game is a mess, the balance is a joke, the Devs went from genuinely decent people to Greedy, money-hungry Disappointments to mankind and that's a wrap.

I'll miss the game, or at least the memories I made with it
tremendos rucheitos te pegan loco xDDD
lindo lindo lindo, perfeito, jogo bom pra krl, meu novo vício.

Dead by Daylight é um jogo divertido para se jogar com amigos! E foca bastante em trabalho em equipe, toda uma estratégia para se seguir e cada um com uma função dentro da partida! 

Esse jogo já me rendeu boas horas e madrugadas com os amigos, super indico para quem procura um desafio, diversão com os amigos!

O game além de ter diversos personagens (cada um deles com suas vantagens e desvantagens) também tem o "killer" que você pode jogar sendo um também e diversas opções algumas deles como Pinhead, Freddy Krueger, Ghostface e vários outros
Its really fun to play as the killer by yourself because of how in control you are along with playing as a survivor with friends with it being exhilarating and just all out fun

it has consumed me, it has taken my kids and wife "karen if you are reading this, know that i love you, i miss you" it is following me everywhere i go it is there i cannot be at peace, it is there even when im showering. Ain Do Do had the chance to save me but it took Ain Do DO :(. I just want my life back, life hasnt been the same ever since i played this game, it is eating my soul, there is nothing left in my life apart from it and this game. ive tried to die many times it saves me it is like a god but there is no god it is some power from a different universe where mario judah is there leader it is mario judah
If the "Dead" in Dead by Daylight is referring to the amount of brain cells I have left after playing this game, then the title is 100% correct.
我一个人类幼崽玩虽不恐怖，但玩屠夫前我很健康，玩屠夫后我就高血压了。

Es entretenido, he escuchado que es muy toxico etc sera por lo poco que llevo jugando. 24 horas en total hasta ahora... quiza mas adelante me de cuenta que en verdad si es toxico por ahora todo marcha bien, lo que si noto es que de asesino pierdes facil ajajajaj creo que si esta desbalanceado cuanto a eso o debes tener habilidades super buenas para ganar de asesino
This game is good at all. At least this is not a dead game :))
buen juego aunque algunas veces tiene bugs, pero en general esta bien.

this game honestly sucks, with a ton of issues that have been reported numerous of times in the past year/years they still haven't fixed this crap. but there isn't any game like it. in what other game can i play as Cheryl Mason, Leon S. Kennedy, or Ash J. FREAKING WILLIAMS! being chased by the embodiment of EVIL, MICHAEL MYERS, and the JUDGE/EXECUTIONER PYRAMID HEAD!!! AND A BUNCH OF HORROR ICONS!!!
IT'S LIKE A WET DREAM OF MINE!!!

i love this game, and the community. even with all the toxicity.
please fix this game <3

Awful developers who don't listen and constant bugs that don't get fixed sometimes ever. balancing is rng based on the map and the what your given especially with the new survivor totems

its daylight and i am still alive
Игра полное говно нет не баланса не нормального античита зря купил лучше бы купил бы хавку а не эту помойку.
Not for the casuel gamer but for people who want to be skillful and competitive this game is excellent.
jogo lixo todo bugado, parece que nunca saiu do beta.
lol kid this game is awesome

Esse é um ótimo jogo para testar a sua fidelidade a algo, porque ele te testa das mais variadas maneiras. a forma com que você é destroçado pelos sobreviventes quando joga de killer é peculiar, afinal não importa o quanto voce odeie tomar lanter e pallet, você segue jogando achando que em algum momento você será como o souza e ganha-rá alguma coisa.
Já de sobrevivente você precisa ser excelente e não tomar nenhum gancho porque provavelmente sera esquecido la.
claro, se jogar com seus amigos o jogo parece-ra um belissimo passeio no park.
No mais, é um bom jogo casual e com o preço da moeda paga (auric cells) rasoavelmente acessivel.
se você pretende comprar esse jogo na promoção saiba que é o mesmo valor você vai pagar numa skin dentro do game.
e um bom jogo e quem nao jogou deve jogar
Bad game. People just camp bodies so it is impossible to play.

Enquanto nao removerem o mapa da pig eu nao tiro meu negativo , mapa chato do kct ! 3000000 palet nessa bosta , vsf . caio de killer já dando al F4 nesse mapa , mapa imundo , nojento , cancer , perda de tempo , queria encontrar de frente o pnc que fez esse mapa , pqp , cara doente do crl !!!!!!!!
if you hate yourself, play this game

Dead by Daylight (dbd) is a great beginner "horror" game. Also dbd is pretty easy to learn and honestly cheap for a great game such as itself. Its so fun with friends and a great use of your money, Its one of those games that could be good for past time or just for your self enjoyment. The events can be lack luster but they are enjoyable such as the special things like this October pumpkins, slight map customizations, and skins for each character.....EXCEPT THE DLC SKINS, THEY NEVER GET ANYTHING.
Nope shit game. I only have so many hours from finding data to shit on it

Achei a mecânica muito boa, gráficos excelentes. Um detalhe que prejudica o jogo é a atualização que demora demais e poderia ter uma call para os survivors. O chat é limitado ao inicio apenas e final.
Помойка состоящая из одной, густой кучи манов и сурвов :)
